title: South Korea Jan exports beat forecasts , logs sharpest rise since 2021
description:
South Korea's exports rose in January for an eighth consecutive month and at the fastest pace in four and a half years, as demand for AI-servers continues to power the country's chip sales, government...
     -February 31, 2026 at 07:08 pm EST
- MarketScreener
content:
